about_the_game:
Yooka-Laylee’s 24-page digital manual and art book features exclusive details on the characters, worlds and challenges set to feature in the highly-anticipated platformer revival! Oh, and there are a few excellent puns in there too, if you’re interested.

The digital artbook includes never-before-seen concept art and in-development images offering an insight into the creation of the game. Marvel at the post-it note origins of serpent salesman Trowzer! Say ‘wow’ as you discover that Dr. Quack used to ride a tank! A must-have for fans.

These files will be found in your Steam folder in - steamapps/common/YookaLaylee/Digital Art Book
detailed_description:
Yooka-Laylee’s 24-page digital manual and art book features exclusive details on the characters, worlds and challenges set to feature in the highly-anticipated platformer revival! Oh, and there are a few excellent puns in there too, if you’re interested.

The digital artbook includes never-before-seen concept art and in-development images offering an insight into the creation of the game. Marvel at the post-it note origins of serpent salesman Trowzer! Say ‘wow’ as you discover that Dr. Quack used to ride a tank! A must-have for fans.

These files will be found in your Steam folder in - steamapps/common/YookaLaylee/Digital Art Book

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or later or SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel i5-2500 3.3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTS450 / AMD Radeon 6850HD
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.5 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 @ 2.7GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 640M or equivalent
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

name: Yooka-Laylee Digital Artbook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-2500 3.3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTS450 / AMD Radeon 6850HD
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Card

short_description: Yooka-Laylee’s 24-page digital manual and art book features exclusive details on the characters, worlds and challenges in the highly-anticipated platformer! With never-before-seen concept art and in-development images offering an insight into the creation of the game, it’s must-have for fans!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian
